text: Anders Hveem (May 10, 1924 - February 2, 2005) was a Norwegian bobsledder who competed in the 1950s. He finished 13th in the four-man event at the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo. ==References== *1952 bobsleigh four-man results *Bobsleigh four-man results: 1948-64. title: Anders Hveem
